thread.title: Maria Lopez

author: Maria Lopez
title: Maria Lopez
text: I am one of those people that review everything before going somewhere or buying something . Some of the reviews weren't good but anywhere you go you will have some bad and good. I know we can't believe everything because sometimes it is the customer's fault. Some crazy people out there.Fortunately, this place has almost five stars for all there locations and now I know why. Good service to the end and great product. And I found this place from word of mouth! Will recommend to all my clients and friends/fam. Everything was perfect!
